comments:
Not sure whose bug this weird one is.

I have an Ant build that is directing output to a file in the workspace.
No refresh
I click on the in the output to open the file and get prompted to synch. Sometime I get:

Is there any other activity in the console view when this happens? We may be trying to activate the console view because of an updated console. At the same time the link is trying to activate a TextEditor to display the contents of the file, but it's blocked by the synchronization of the workspace file with the file system.

If the console view in not active, and a console is receiving a lot of output, it will repeatedly try to make itself itself active. It's not recursive, but it may appear to be.

traces.message: WARNING: Prevented recursive attempt to activate part org.eclipse.ui.console.ConsoleView while still in the middle of activating part org.eclipse.ui.DefaultTextEditor
